an9.30:4.1: * “Navayime, bhikkhave, āghātapaṭivinayā.
an9.30:4.3: ‘Anatthaṃ me acari, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:4.4: ‘anatthaṃ me carati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:4.5: ‘anatthaṃ me carissati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:4.6: piyassa me manāpassa anatthaṃ acari … pe …
an9.30:4.8: ‘anatthaṃ carissati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:4.9: appiyassa me amanāpassa atthaṃ acari … pe …
an9.30:4.11: ‘atthaṃ carissati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti.
